title: Readout of the Vice President’s Call with Turkish Cypriot Leader Mustafa Akinci – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
June 21, 2017
The Vice President spoke by telephone today with Turkish Cypriot leader Mustafa Akinci. The Vice President underscored U.S. support for the resumption of UN-facilitated talks in Switzerland and expressed hope that the Greek Cypriot and Turkish Cypriot leaders will agree to a settlement that would reunify Cyprus as a bizonal, bicommunal federation to the benefit of all Cypriots.
